methods.description: Return a full list of laws and incentives that match your query.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Response format

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of laws returned

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Return laws for the given Jurisdiction. Jurisdiction must be given as a two character state code (eg, 'CO' for Colorado). A single jurisdiction, or a comma-separate list of multiple jurisdiction, may be given.  Use the code 'US' for federal laws and the code 'DC' for Washington D.C.

parameters.name: technology
parameters.description: Search by the technology type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values and what they stand for are as follows: 'BIOD' for Biodiesel, 'ETH' for Ethanol / Flexible Fuel Vehicles, 'NG' for Natural Gas / Natural Gas Vehicles, 'LPG' for Liquefied Petroleum Gas (Propane) / Propane Vehicles, 'HY' for Hydrogen / Fuel Cell Electric Vehicles, 'ELEC' for All-Electric Vehicles (EVs), 'PHEV' for Plug-In Hybrid Electric Vehicles (PHEVs), 'HEV' for Hybrid Electric Vehicles (HEVs), 'NEVS' for Neighborhood Electric Vehicles (NEVs), 'RD' for Renewable Diesel, 'AFTMKTCONV' for Aftermarket Conversions, 'EFFEC' for Fuel Economy / Efficiency, 'IR' for Idle Reduction, 'AUTONOMOUS' for Connected and Autonomous Vehicles, and 'OTHER' for Other.

parameters.name: incentiveType
parameters.description: Search by the incentive type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values and what they stand for are as follows: 'GNT' for Grants, 'TAX' for Tax Incentives, 'LOANS' for Loans and Leases, 'RBATE' for Rebates, 'EXEM' for Exemptions, 'TOU' for Time-of-Use Rate, and 'OTHER' for Other.

parameters.name: regulationType
parameters.description: Search by the regulation type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values and what they stand for are as follows: 'REQ' for Acquisition / Fuel Use, 'DREST' for Driving / Idling, 'REGIS' for Registration / Licensing, 'EVFEE' for EV Registration Fee, 'FUEL' for Fuel Taxes, 'STD' for Fuel Production / Quality, 'RFS' for Renewable Fuel Standard / Mandate, 'AIRQEMISSIONS' for Air Quality / Emissions, 'CCEINIT' for Climate Change / Energy Initiatives, 'UTILITY' for Utility Definition, 'BUILD' for Building Codes, 'RTC' for Right-to-Charge, and 'OTHER' for Other.

parameters.name: userType
parameters.description: Search by the user type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values and what they stand for are as follows: 'FLEET' for Commercial, 'GOV' for Government Entity, 'TRIBAL' for Tribal Government, 'IND' for Personal Vehicle Owner or Driver, 'STATION' for Alternative Fuel Infrastructure Operator, 'AFP' for Alternative Fuel Producer, 'PURCH' for Alternative Fuel Purchaser, 'MAN' for Alternative Fuel Vehicle (AFV) Manufacturer or Retrofitter, 'MUD' for Multi-Unit Dwelling, 'TRANS' for Transit, and 'OTHER' for Other.

parameters.name: poc
parameters.description: Include points of contacts in the return value.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: Return only recently added or updated laws and incentives

parameters.name: expired
parameters.description: The 'true' value returns only expired, repealed, or archived laws and incentives. The default 'false' value returns only current laws and incentives.

parameters.name: lawType
parameters.description: Search by the law type. A single type, or a comma-separate list of multiple types, may be given. Values are as follows: 'STATEINC' for State Incentives, 'UPINC ' for Utility/Private Incentives, 'LAWREG' for Laws and Regulations, 'INC' for Incentives, 'PROG' for Programs, 'LUP' for Last Updated, 'OVIEW' for Overview, and 'HILITE' for Highlights.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search laws by keyword in title or text.

parameters.name: local
parameters.description: Show only local examples of laws and incentives.

methods.description: Return the law categories for a given category type.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Response format

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Search by the category type.

methods.description: Get the points of contact for a given jurisdiction.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Response format

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Return the points of contact for the given Jurisdiction. Jurisdiction must be given as a two character state code (eg, 'CO' for Colorado). A single jurisdiction, or a comma-separate list of multiple jurisdiction, may be given.  Use the code 'US' for federal laws and the code 'DC' for Washington D.C.

methods.description: Fetch the details of a specific law given the law's ID.

parameters.name: outputFormat
parameters.description: Response format

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: API Key

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the law that you are searching

parameters.name: poc
parameters.description: Include points of contacts in the return value.

parameters.name: expired
parameters.description: The 'true' value returns a record no matter its status (current, expired, archived, or repealed). The default 'false' value returns only current laws and incentives.

apiDescription: Query our database of federal and state laws and incentives for alternative fuels and vehicles, air quality, fuel efficiency, and other transportation-related topics. This dataset powers the Federal and State Laws and Incentives on the Alternative Fuels Data Center.
